about_the_game:
Rabbit Party : Night of Assassins

Step into a pulsating nightclub where rabbits dance the night away - but beneath the glittering lights and thumping music lies a deadly game of deception. VIP bunnies mingle with the crowd, unaware of the assassin rabbits who lurk in the shadows, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

Killers vs. Wolves: A Dance of Death

Take your role as either an assassin rabbit who must eliminate VIP targets while maintaining their cover, or join the wolf security team using keen observation skills to identify and neutralize the threats. No matter which side you choose, feel the pressure mount as you race against time to complete your mission or survive the night.

Key Features:

Vibrant Nightclub Setting: Immerse yourself in a unique atmosphere filled with laser lights, energetic music, and dancing rabbits

Master of Deception: As an assassin rabbit, carefully plan your moves and maintain your cover while hunting VIP targets

Watchful Protector: Take on the role of a wolf, using observation and deduction to distinguish innocent bunnies from deadly assassins

Race Against Time: Experience heart-pounding gameplay as you work to achieve your objectives before time runs out

Multiplayer Mayhem: Join forces with friends in intense battles of wit and deception

Your Choice, Your Destiny

The party is just getting started, but who will emerge victorious? Will you successfully protect the VIPs, or execute the perfect assassination? Jump into the dangerous party now and find out!

name: RabbitParty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 또는 AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 또는 AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 또는 AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 또는 AMD 6700-XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: A breathtaking assassination plan taking place at the rabbits' fancy nightclub! The wolf must prevent the assassination of the rabbits, and the rabbit must hide among the regular rabbits and assassinate the VIP rabbits without being detected by the wolf.
